resources.string: This app needs bluetooth access in order to communicate with SafeTravel locking devices. The SafeTravel locking devices can still be managed without bluetooth, using internet connection.

These are all the devices paired to the phone. Click on your SafeTravel device to add and use it. If you don\'t see your device here please pair it to the phone.
